Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near Halsted/115th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/115th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/115th due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 119th, Ashland and 115th.

Northbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 115th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses temp. rerouted NB: 115th, Halsted, 119th, Ashland and 115th SB: 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Ashland and 115th: near 115th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 115th/Halsted, due to street blockage near115th/Halsted.

Northbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Ashland and 115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Wacker Dr.
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Jefferson, Monroe, LaSalle, and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Wacker Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Jefferson, Monroe, LaSalle, and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Wacker Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jackson/Wacker Dr
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Wacker Drive, Van Buren, Jefferson, Monroe, LaSalle, and Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Wacker Drive, Van Buren, Jefferson, Monroe, LaSalle, and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Wacker Dr.


Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound service is not affected.
